author: TOI Contributor
title: Hunger or disease? Emerging nations face an awful choice as it’s nearly impossible to socially distance and get food
description: Pakistan has left open key export industries, including textiles. For nations that lack a social safety net, “full lockdowns will only lead to more hunger, starvations and death,” says Luhut Pandjaitan, a senior minister in Indonesia, which was slow to issue …
content: Ruchir SharmaThough many rich economies have ground to a halt under strict lockdowns to contain the coronavirus, many low- and middle-income countries have decided they can’t afford an all-out fight. Brazil’s president has taken the most controversial stand a… [+5295 chars]
